reviews.review: огромный и интересный сюжет, подойдет тем у кого много свободного времени! не игра а легенда!!!

Portal 2 is probably the best game ive ever played, the Story is great and you can even play it with friends wich is fun.
Its worth to buy!

Çok beğendim ayrıca fiyatı da gayet uygun. Ben indirimden bundle halinde 1. ve 2. oyunu satın almıştım. Bölümler çok iyi tasarlanmış ve çözmek çok zevkli. Özellikle oyunun sonu beni çok etkiledi. Hikayeyi daha iyi anlamanız için altyazı açmanızı öneririm. Hikayeyi dikkatli dinlerseniz oyun çok daha zevkli oluyor. Kesinlikle oynamanızı öneriyorum.
Very good and funny game, which you can play with friends

Considerablemente más largo que la versión anterior y explica un poco más el universo de Portal, este juego es muy entretenido y retador para los que les gustan los rompecabezas.
Gráficos: 10/10 (considerando su año de lanzamiento)
Sonido: 9/10 (la música sirve bien como recurso para elevar la tensión)
Trama: 9/10 (algunos detalles podrían parecer irrelevantes si no se ha jugado Portal 1 pero sí es interesante)
Jugabilidad: 10/10 (un distintivo obvio del juego es el manejo de portales)
говно я не могу побить рекод друга
ИГРЫ ВНЕ ПОЛИТИКИ, ВЫ НЕ СМЕЕТЕ ЗАПРЕЩАТЬ НАМ ИГРАТЬ
Portal 2 очень сложная головоломка для меня, но сюжет прекрасен. Рекомендую!

i dont think this game requires any presentation: great game, amazing graphics for his time, well written story and most important of all: PotatOS. 

10/10 would fight a giant robot with a potato and a portal gun again

双人模式会比单人模式好玩得多，惊艳得多。玩完官方关卡后，去创意工坊下载几个双人MOD关卡玩，真的很不错。解完谜后成就感爆棚。单人模式略显无聊。

要有个朋友哦。
Шикарная игра, даже спустя 10 лет играется очень бодро. Отличный гемлей, сюжет, юмор, персонажи, в этой игре почти все идеально. Игра на века
Its been like 12 years you're missing out on a lot if you haven't played this
I love this game. Doesn't matter what its on I love Portal 2
Игра идеальная, но с моими любимыми оладьями будет ещё лучше
玩着玩着就明白了　玩就完事了
Bad gam too hard i dyed please fix gam Gaben
Muy viciante, pero con  buenos LOGROS y buena historia.
You should buy it. Still trying to get my girlfriend to play the co-op with me, since back in the day I had it on ps3 and all my friends had x-box 360s, but i hear the co-op is really good too.
Interesting story, fun gameplay and co-op. 10/10

If you like a game with suspense and critical thinking, please do buy this game!
Valve is a blessing to this game!

2 kişilik oyun için en iyi tercih oyunda fizik denen şey tanrısal oyunu valve yaptığı için hikayeyi zor bulursunuz özellikle seslendirmeler ve diyologlar mükemmel bazı bulmacalara beynim yetmedi alcaksanız ıq seviyeniz en az 90 olmalı bence
Incredible game, very good, has a level editor for when you get bored of the story.
fuckin killed me while we were playing the game and reset the entire game after we had completed it and were doing a replay im MAD
Bullying people is very fun in this game. Getting bullied by them is just as fun
Glados ist immer noch eine der gruseligsten und coolsten Antagonisten, die es überhaupt gibt. Portal 2 ist genauso gut wie Portal 1 und mit dem Multiplayer umso besser.

Miért az értékeléseket olvasod itt lent?
Görgess fel és vedd meg!
Bölümlere az kafa yorunca geçilebilen zevkli bir oyun
Лучшая игра, в которую я играл. Всем советую будете очень рады после прохождения

OMG!! I love this game so much. This game takes portal, gives it super amazing graphics, an amazing and funny storyline, somehow makes graphics this slick in 2011 and BOOM! Portal 2 is here! 100% best game i've ever played, would recommend it to everybody.

i remember when playing co op with a friend we'd try our best to not kill any turrets and tbh its more fun that murdering them all, we named the turrets "bogdan" and sticked to that

anyways amazing game
fajna gra ale 20 poziom jest trudny
é bom, porém é meio poggers, mas eu acho omegalul, ent talvez possa ser kekw
es un muy buen juego se los recomiendo
Very fun game, might be challenging but when you beat a hard level it feels like you topped a mountain. Good sense of humor and definetely a reccomend!

이런 대가리 쓰는겜은 나랑은 안맞는다...
취향인 사람만 하세용

Игра просто офигенная, реально советую, в этой игре над вами будут подшучивать, немного издеваться но к конце вы будете королем ХАХАХАХА и все там поубиваете, кхм короче игра довольно быстро проходится сюжет и графика, визуал просто шикарен.
